description:
Capline enters the Town Idol Audition. Her rival is Sakura-san, the cute girl with a lovely singing voice. Capline gives it all she`s got in a battle she can`t lose. After the self-introductions and singing contest, Capline is disheartened by the perfection of Sakura`s performance. B.B.B. can`t stand to see her so down, so he takes action!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決定!? アイドルオーディション
